---

This 12-foot sword was made by a [cyclops](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=25) in the ancient past. It might be the greatest dragon-killing weapon ever made, and [Fafnheir](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1725) justly fears it, which is why he keeps it hidden in his hoard. Runes of dragon slaying are written down its blade. _Ridill_ is a _+3 [major striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [dragon bane](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1041) [speed](/Equipment.aspx?ID=304) [adamantine](/Equipment.aspx?ID=374) [greatsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=24)_. While wielding _Ridill_, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saves against [_fear_](/Spells.aspx?ID=110). This increases to +4 if the effect is from a [dragon](/Traits.aspx?ID=50). If you have an ability that depends on Large weapons (such as [barbarian giant instinct](/Instincts.aspx?ID=4)), it works with _Ridill_.

 _Ridill_ is always considered to have the appropriate material or damage type necessary to deactivate a dragon's [regeneration](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=26) or cause the dragon's weakness to apply. For example, _Ridill_ is considered to be [cold iron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=375) when attacking a [linnorm](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=69), while it would be treated as having dealt cold damage when attacking a [red dragon](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=168). If the dragon has more than one weakness, only the highest value applies.

**Destruction** If you boil _Ridill_ in the blood of 10 different types of dragon ([blue dragon](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=166) dragon, red dragon, etc.) and drop the eye of a cyclops seer into the brew, _Ridill_ melts away into nothingness.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
